      • computeDistanceForSpeedChange

        public static double computeDistanceForSpeedChange​(double initialSpeed,
                                                   double desiredSpeed,
                                                   double a)
        Computes the distance needed to change the speed according to given params. Sign of acceleration is considered, i.e. for braking (desiredSpeed < initial speed) acceleration has to be negative.
        Parameters:
        initialSpeed - start velocity in [m/s]
        desiredSpeed - final velocity in [m/s]
        a - acceleration during speed change [m/s^2]
        Returns:
        resulting distance in [m]

      • computeTimeForSpeedChange

        public static double computeTimeForSpeedChange​(double initialSpeed,
                                               double desiredSpeed,
                                               double a)

      • computeAccelerationForSpeedChange

        public static double computeAccelerationForSpeedChange​(double initialSpeed,
                                                       double desiredSpeed,
                                                       double x)
        Parameters:
        initialSpeed - start velocity in [m/s]
        desiredSpeed - final velocity in [m/s]
        x - available track length [m]
        Returns:
        needed acceleration in [m/s^2] to achieve the speed change on available track length

      • computeMaxCurveSpeed

        public static double computeMaxCurveSpeed​(double lateralAccel,
                                          double curvature)
        Computes the maximum speed for a curve with given curvature and specified lateral acceleration. Returned speed might be Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY in case the curvature is 0.0 (straight).
        Parameters:
        lateralAccel - lateral acceleration in [m/s]
        curvature - curvature in [1/m]
        Returns:
        speed to achieve given lateral acceleration in curve
